xdi2.core.features.nodetypes

Class XdiInnerRoot

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiAbstractContext<XdiRoot>
      • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiAbstractRoot
        • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiInnerRoot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<XdiContext<?>>, XdiContext<XdiRoot>, XdiRoot
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XdiInnerRoot.Definition, XdiInnerRoot.Variable

    public class XdiInnerRoot
extends XdiAbstractRoot
    An XDI inner root, represented as a context node.
    Author:
    markus
